Package faultmodel.mgf.smgfdatastructure

Class SMGFResult

java.lang.Object
faultmodel.mgf.smgfdatastructure.SMGFResult
public class SMGFResult extends Object
Data structure for SMGF test results.
Author:
AKASH

  • Constructor Details

    • SMGFResult

      public SMGFResult(int noOfTestVectors, int noOfGates) throws SMGFException
      Provided by number of tests and number of gates, it initializes the data structure to store the test result.

      Both the arguments should be valid(i.e. less than or equal to 0 not allowed) and must match with actual circuit and test set.

      Parameters:
      noOfTestVectors - number of test vectors present in the test set.
      noOfGates - number of gates present in the circuit.
      Throws:
      SMGFException - thrown if the arguments are negative.

  • Method Details

    • setResult

      public void setResult(int testVectorNo, int gateNo, boolean value) throws SMGFException
      Updates the result.

      If test vector t tests gate numbers g then call setResult(t, g, true) otherwise call setResult(t, g, false) (although it is optional).

      Parameters:
      testVectorNo - index number of test vector(starting index is 0)
      gateNo - gate number(starting gate number is 0)
      value - whether it is tested or not.
      Throws:
      SMGFException - thrown if invalid test vector number or invalid gate number is given

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Clears the result.

    • gateToTVecs

      public int[] gateToTVecs(int gateNo) throws SMGFException
      Returns all the test vectors which test the gate, provided as argument.
      Parameters:
      gateNo - index number of the gate present in the circuit(first is 0).
      Returns:
      array of test vector numbers which test the gate.
      Throws:
      SMGFException - thrown if invalid gate number is given

    • tVecToGates

      public int[] tVecToGates(int tVecNo) throws SMGFException
      Returns the gates which are tested by the test vector, provided as argument.
      Parameters:
      tVecNo - index number of the test vector in the test set.
      Returns:
      array of gate numbers which are tested by the test vector.
      Throws:
      SMGFException - thrown if invalid test vector number is given.

    • isCircuitTested

      public boolean isCircuitTested()
      Returns true if the entire circuit is tested.

      true if each and every gate of the circuit is tested by at least one test vector. Otherwise false.

      Returns:
      true if the circuit is tested otherwise false.
